summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use, amending Sections 23.41.004, 23.41.006, 23.41.012, 23.50.012, 23.50.014, 23.50.026, 23.50.027, and 23.54.015 of the Seattle Municipal Code; adding a new Chapter 23.74 to the Seattle Municipal Code and amending the Official Land Use Map to establish a Stadium Transition Area Overlay District; and amending the Downtown Design Guidelines to include provisions for that District, implementing the adopted neighborhood plan for the Greater Duwamish Manufacturing/Industrial Center.
